feed.title: Voyager
feed.subtitle:
Welcome to "Voyager," the podcast where the frontiers of technology, cybersecurity, and scientific discovery converge. Each week, we embark on a digital odyssey through the vast and ever-evolving landscape of the internet to bring you the most intriguing and vital stories from the realms of tech and science.
In "Voyager," we delve deep into the latest advancements in technology, from groundbreaking gadgets and innovations to the software shaping our digital world. We unravel the complex and fascinating world of cybersecurity, keeping you informed about the latest threats, defenses, and trends that matter in our increasingly connected lives.
But our journey doesn't stop there. We also traverse the exciting universe of scientific discovery, bringing you cutting-edge news, interviews with thought leaders, and insights into the research that's changing our understanding of the world and beyond.
Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a cybersecurity professional, or just curious about the scientific phenomena shaping our future, "Voyager" is your guide through the complex web of modern innovation. Join us as we explore the most compelling stories at the intersection of technology, cybersecurity, and science – stories that inform, inspire, and ignite the imagination.
Subscribe to "Voyager" and stay ahead of the curve in this fast-paced digital age. New episodes drop every week, filled with expert analysis, engaging discussions, and a passion for the marvels of the internet era. Set sail with us on this journey of discovery and exploration – into the heart of what's next.

entry.title: "The Dark Side of AI: Unveiling the Criminal Underworld"
entry.summary:
In recent news, the FBI has reported that criminals are utilizing artificial intelligence to create child pornography, raising concerns about the misuse of advanced technology. This alarming development highlights the need for stricter regulations and increased efforts to combat such heinous crimes. Meanwhile, Tableau has released the beta version of Einstein Copilot, a new tool as part of Salesforce's broader AI rollout. This innovative tool aims to enhance productivity and decision-making by leveraging artificial intelligence capabilities. In the world of music, over 200 artists, including Billie Eilish and Nicki Minaj, are fighting against the "catastrophic" use of AI in music. They express concerns about the potential impact of artificial intelligence on creativity and artistic expression. Additionally, organizations are advised to evaluate four AI deployment classes in preparation for the EU Artificial Intelligence Act, according to Gartner. This act emphasizes the importance of responsible and ethical AI implementation. On the technology front, Google ImageFX has been reviewed as a fun and free starting point to explore AI image generators. This tool allows users to experiment with AI-generated images, showcasing the potential of artificial intelligence in creative applications. In the realm of international partnerships, the US and UK have established new collaborations in artificial intelligence security. This joint effort aims to address the growing challenges and threats associated with AI, ensuring the safety and integrity of AI systems. Lastly, China's Chery is reportedly launching a new electric vehicle brand this year, further contributing to the global shift towards sustainable transportation.

In terms of new tools, products, or projects, one notable release is Tableau's Einstein Copilot beta. This tool, integrated into Salesforce's AI rollout, aims to provide users with enhanced decision-making capabilities and increased productivity. Additionally, Google ImageFX offers a fun and free starting point for users to explore AI image generators, allowing them to experiment with AI-generated images. These tools showcase the potential of artificial intelligence in various domains, from business intelligence to creative applications.
